title: I regret nothing
body:
https://i.redd.it/mwkmz9gn4e031.jpg

###### Meme from [this post](https://www.reddit.com/r/LeagueOfMemes/comments/bswznd/only_spent_about_400/) on Reddit by u/LissXsis

replies.body:
Me when i get that college diploma job next week & first paycheck.
https://media.giphy.com/media/l41Yw2YQ1tekNE6zu/giphy.gif

A job, that requires your degree, that you're starting soon, that actually pays you, in this heavy underemployment economy?
https://i.imgur.com/CWsQmAe.png[]

>###In all seriousness, congrats!  May your bosses be aloof and your coworkers welcoming.

Ayyy congrats!

https://i.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/001/121/498/3b5.gif

> [{quoted}](name=Demon King Maou,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=AwmhKQu8,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2019-05-26T02:38:46.084+0000)
>
> Me when i get that college diploma job next week & first paycheck.
> https://media.giphy.com/media/l41Yw2YQ1tekNE6zu/giphy.gif

Strip club to see some real skin? ðŸ˜‚ ðŸ˜”

I used to dump 10-15KWD (32.97USD-49.45USD) for RP each month. but since with each patch after another Rito screwing up this game i stopped doing that.

I really love this game. but the way Rito balancing this game ruin the fun and would rather use my money for a family feast instead.

> [{quoted}](name=Wizard Blaze,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=AwmhKQu8,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-05-26T00:47:12.766+0000)
>
> I used to dump 10-15KWD (32.97USD-49.45USD) for RP each month. but since with each patch after another Rito screwing up this game i stopped doing that.
> 
> I really love this game. but the way Rito balancing this game ruin the fun and would rather use my money for a family feast instead.

Tbh a bit on the odd side you wouldn't use the money for a family feast in the first place imo

> [{quoted}](name=Schoenberg,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=AwmhKQu8,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2019-05-26T02:47:39.939+0000)
>
> Tbh a bit on the odd side you wouldn't use the money for a family feast in the first place imo

i do that every month . but when i stopped buying rp i did better feast instead. its better to see all family and relatives sitting feasting on one table laughing and smiling than to give Riot my money.
Hey fellow Kuwaiti lol

> [{quoted}](name=AngelFrost00,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=AwmhKQu8,comment-id=00020001,timestamp=2019-05-26T11:48:07.809+0000)
>
> Hey fellow Kuwaiti lol

what are you doing in EUNE? GET OUT OF THERE! and if you dont have money sell a barrel of ~~truffles ~~i mean oil for it
Isn't ping in EUNE better than EUW if you live in kuwait?

Wowie life is a lie.
If you have that much rp.. why dont you gift meh some skins xD
Exactly why I don't buy skins. My Indian parents have taught me well.
Same
_laughs in being to poor to afford lol skins_
too* poor
A fool and his money are soon parted.

One way or another...

{{sticker:sg-syndra}}

not me anymore. spending money more wisely this time around.

never again riot.
Why...
Skins are the only thing i buy. Why waste money on everything else that doesn't work or has a bug in it? (Fuk client)
